outputs.output_descr: In addition to the development of a sustainable beverage container recycling operation, the project will help support the diversion of organic waste for composting and public education and awareness programmes. The project will also support the development and enactment of appropriate legislations for imposition of deposits on beverage containers and management of container deposit recovery fee.

project_descr: The project will support Fiji's efforts to implement its Waste Management Strategy through the development of a sustainable beverage container recycling operation.
